title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 425.17 - Dental services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 425.17 - Dental services

State Regulations

The operator, directly or through the managed care plan
that referred the registrant to the adult day health care program, must, as
appropriate: (a) provide or refer
registrants for dental services; and
(b) ensure that dental services provided to
registrants or for which they are referred are in conformance with the needs
identified during the comprehensive assessment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10

425.17

New

New

York State Register March 20, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 12, eff. 3/20/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
